biotools.summary: Ad hoc learning of fragmentation patterns in mass spectra detects post-translationally modified peptides prior to database search. Deep learning model (Temporal conv net, using dilated conv layers) detects post-translational modified peptides based on their ms/ms spectrum.

bioschemas.name: AHLF
bioschemas.summary: Ad hoc learning of fragmentation patterns in mass spectra detects post-translationally modified peptides prior to database search. Deep learning model (Temporal conv net, using dilated conv layers) detects post-translational modified peptides based on their ms/ms spectrum.
